suggest.spryker-shop/customer-page: Use this module when you want to use CustomerNavigationWidget
suggest.spryker-shop/sales-configurable-bundle-w: Use this module when you want to use OrderItemsConfiguredBundleWidget
suggest.spryker-shop/sales-product-bundle-widget: Use this module when you want to use ProductBundleSalesReturnPageFormExpanderPlugin
suggest.spryker-shop/sales-product-configuration: Add the module if you want to use ProductConfigurationOrderItemDisplayWidget.
suggest.spryker/router: Use this module if you want use the RouterProviderPlugin.
suggest.spryker-shop/merchant-widget: Use this module if you want to use the SoldbyMerchantWidget.
suggest.spryker-shop/merchant-sales-return-widge: Use this module if you want to use the MerchantSalesReturnCreateFormWidget.
